description:
Microsoft is set to host top executives from South Korea’s leading technology firms next month to strengthen its AI partnerships. The high-level meeting, dubbed the MS CEO Summit 2024, will be held on 14 May 2024 and feature Microsoft’s founder Bill Gates and Chairman and CEO Satya Nadella. They will engage in closed-door discussions with... Read more »

The post Microsoft to forge AI partnerships with South Korean tech leaders appeared first on AI News.
title: Microsoft to forge AI partnerships with South Korean tech leaders
